definitions.title: n.pr. gent. et terr.
definitions.body: Moab (MI:1, MI:2, MI:5, MI:6, MI:12, MI:20 [[מאב]]; As. Ma’aba, Ma’bu, Mu’âba, etc., Schr:COT Gloss., and on Ge 19:37 Dl:Par. 294 f., 296;—on etym. cf. Lag:BN 90 Anm., Ne:SK 1892, 573, Gray:Prop.N.25);—´[[מו]] Ge 19:37 + 178 t.; [[מׂאָב]] 2Sa 8:12; LXX Mwab;—
Moab as son of Lot by his elder daughter acc. to Ge 19:37.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = nation of which Lot's son is represented as ancestor Ge 19:37, Nu 21:29, Nu 22:3, Nu 22:3, Am 2:1, Am 2:2, Je 48:1, Je 48:2 + 30 t. Je 4:8 + oft.; having a king, Nu 21:26, Nu 22:4, Nu 22:10, Ju Jdg 3:12, 1Sa 12:9 +.
